function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate cleaning processes and supplies","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion due to unclean surfaces and lack of hygiene supplies","Mitigation":"Increase cleaning frequency and restock supplies in advance","Technologies":"Advanced cleaning technologies and simulation programs","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and staff","Owner":"Building management and facility maintenance team"},{"Description":"Lack of coordination between engineering disciplines","Impact":"Unsafe and unhealthy built environment due to mismatched design solutions","Mitigation":"Utilize simulation programs to coordinate engineering disciplines and match their needs","Technologies":"Simulation programs for design coordination","People":"Architects, engineers, and urban planners","Owner":"Project managers and design coordinators"},{"Description":"Inadequate design approaches for infection prevention","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious infections due to poor design strategies","Mitigation":"Implement design strategies for sunlight and natural ventilation, and consider architectural space in infection prevention","Technologies":"Simulation programs for design evaluation and implementation","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and staff","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, and facility designers"}]}
